channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The road is sinking just after the bridge as you head to stoke orchard,, 15th October
item.description:
The road has sunk and cause a bump in the road, which has caused damage to my car. It is the road where you go past Tredington school on the way to stoke orchard, just as you come off the motorway bridge
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A small piece of land alongside Betty Robert’s Lane (the public footpath along Ham brook) is being widened and is significantly restricting the size and use of the public footpath. Material has been put in Ham brook (narrowing the brook) to allow more of the footpath to be enclosed by a fence. This work in the brook is visible in the photos. The footpath is now very restricted and use for wheelchair or prams may be blocked. Can an immediate cease and desist notice be served whilst all the legalities are sorted as further work is continuing every day?, 15th October
item.description:
On the footpath alongside Ham brook, known as Betty Robert’s Lane, where it joins the end of School Lane Shurdington.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Blenheim Orchard, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 15th October
item.description:
Good morning, I would like to report that a large number of street lamps are not working outside my property (312 Hatherley road, Cheltenham, GL516HU). The area is in pitch black and quite unsafe for anyone walking in the area.
Report on FixMyStreet
